drag-and-drop-to-start: Drag & Drop a folder with book data here to start.
learn-more-long: Learn more about how to build books using little.webby.press
manuscript-tab-description: The Manuscript tab only lists files listed in Book.toml. The files are listed in the order they'll appear in the book (this is your spine).
options-book-format-blurb: The eBook will be assembled in EPUB3 non-DRM format.
options-ebook-is-disabled: eBook support is disabled in your configuration.
options-website-format-blurb:
The website generated by this tool is a static website that can be
				deployed to any webserver.
options-website-is-disabled: Website support is disabled in your configuration.
